goal.ch: 本課程旨在以企業國際化的觀點介紹全球運籌體系的規劃與建置，期使同學能具有由產業特性及個別企業特性著手，應用「佈局-營運-IT」的架構對企業的運籌與供應鏈體系進行營運機制的設計及資訊方案規劃的能力。
goal.en:
“Based on the concept of global manufacturing, this course introduces the methodology used in global supply chain planning and configuration. It helps students to develop the capability to build global logistics systems using the “Strategic deployment – operations planning – IT solutions” framework.     
Progress in this course is application-oriented. Each course unit is accompanied by at least one industry case study. The concepts, frameworks and methods used in global production and logistics are first introduced, and are then applied to the electronics manufacturing, semiconductor manufacturing and automotive manufacturing industries. The planning methods used for service parts logistics are also discussed. 
In addition to production logistics, the course also covers distribution, transport and warehousing logistics. During this component of the course, the logistics planning methods for regional distribution centres are introduced. Also, the business model for the value integration of industrial parts and cargo logistics ports is discussed using a case study taken from the Asian automotive industry.  
 The course concludes with a discussion of SAP-based solutions for global production and logistics.“

outline.en:
“I. Introductory Cases
II. Concept of Global Production and Logistics
1.1 Globalization of Manufacturing Industry
1.2 Concept of Global Production
1.3 Concept of Global Logistics
III. Framework of Global Production and Logistics
2.1 Basic Supply Chains Model
2.2 Market Analysis
2.3 Production-Distribution Baseline
2.4 Suppliers Management
2.5 Transportation and Warehousing
2.6 Reverse Logistics
2.7 Configuration of Global Supply Network
IV. Methods for Global Production and Logistics
4.1  Planning framework of Advanced Planning Systems (APS)
4.2  Rolling Forecast (RFC) for Market Demand
4.3  Cargo-flows Analysis
4.4  Computer Simulation
V. Global Logistics of Electronics Manufacturing Industry
5.1  Electronics Manufacturing Industry
5.2  Analysis of Logistics Problems
5.3  Logistics Planning in the Electronics Manufacturing Industry
5.4  Case Study
VI. Global Logistics of Semiconductors Manufacturing Industry
6.1  Semiconductors Manufacturing Industry
6.2  Analysis of Logistics Problems
6.3  Logistics Planning in the Semiconductors Manufacturing Industry
6.4  Case Study
VII. Global Logistics of Automotive Manufacturing Industry
7.1  Automotive Manufacturing Industry
7.2  Analysis of Logistics Problems
7.3  Logistics Planning in the Automotive Manufacturing Industry
7.4  Case Study of Automotive Manufacturing Industry in Asian
VIII. Service Parts Logistics
8.1  Service Parts and its Management
8.2  Analysis of Logistics Problems
8.3  Service Parts Logistics Planning in the Automotive Industry
8.4  Case Study
IX. Integration of Industrial Park and Logistics Ports
9.1  Transportation and Warehousing in the Global Logistics
9.2  Analysis of Logistics Problems
9.3  Integration of Industrial Park and Logistics Centers
9.4  Case Study
X. IT solutions for the Global Logistics Planning
10.1  Framework of SAP-APO
10.2  Planning methods in the SAP-APO
10.3  SAP APO-PP/DS
10.4  Adexa and i2
10.5  SAP-LES
10.6  Case Study
XI. Term Projects and Discussions“
